website_summaries.verdict: Our pick for best value. You can spend more, but we love the taste and the results. Hard to go wrong with this.
pros: Delicious taste, versatile, and builds muscle as advertised
More affordable than some other options
cons: Very high soy content may turn some people off

customer_reviews.title: Ordered at last 30 containers of this
customer_reviews.text: Been taking protein for the last 20 years and this is by far the best protein I have used. Best tasting (peanut butter cookie) Best mixing (no lumping) Best absorbing (no “runs”) Best profile (ingredients) Monday - Friday I drink 5 scoops a day and since I have I have never been stronger and performed as well in the gym. This is much more important than any creatine or pre workout you can take. Save your money and buy this and take it religiously and you’ll see Results over night.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: SYNTHA-6 vs COMBAT PRO (Vanilla)
customer_reviews.text: My personal opinions: They both taste very well and are not over powering in flavor. I always get vanilla because I don't like too sweet of a taste. This also allows me to add any flavor I want. I add a serving of yogurt to the one scoop of protein in a regular shaker bottle and they both mix very well. I use water and not milk. I like them both. I have attached photos so you can compare and assist in your purchasing decisions. I hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: House OF Yorkies

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: Not much more to add from other great reviews here. I have never found a protein powder that I actually look forward to drinking. Synths-6 gets it right. I’ve had many flavors. All good. Cookies and cream with almond milk is my favorite. Mixes very easily in a shaker bottle. No blender needed. If you’re looking for a good tasting whey protein shake, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Been using SYNTHA-6 products for over 4 years now. The taste is the #1 for me. #2 is the mixability. No chunks, smooth delicious flavors. I believe SYNTHA has the best flavors on the market. The taste is way better than any protein mix I have ever had. Worst part about it is that it’s so good you’ll find yourself making 4-5 shakes a day just for the taste. Highly recommend as it packs on the weight and muscle. Muscle recovery is also great when taking post workout. Has always allowed me to go hard everyday, even after a killer pump the day before.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley D Brooks

customer_reviews.title: cinnamon bun is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge chocolate fan so I've had both the Cinnamon bun flavor and the graham cracker flavor. The Cinnamon is great, and I will certainly get it again. Didn't really like the taste or smell of the graham cracker one, but it's good to try different flavors. Has helped me with repairing muscles after lifting weights. I have seen improvement in conjunction with eating properly. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: J_Sant

customer_reviews.title: Like a McD milkshake
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about 15 years. It is by far the best tasting protein powder out there. My favorite is strawberry because it reminds me of the flavor of a McD strawberry shake. Vanilla is pretty good to. Not a fan of the chocolate. Every so often I try a new brand just to change it up but always end up going back to old faithful - Syntha 6. As an added bonus, this is one of few powders that doesn't clump - it stirs smooth every time. Low calorie and good for you. Get sum.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: SO YUMMY
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST TASTING PROTEIN EVER! My boyfriend and I, both fitness junkies, love the cookies and cream flavor. It is half the price that his health club sells it at. I would drink it even if it didnt have protein- it's that delicious!
customer_reviews.author: BlessedSiren

customer_reviews.title: Extreme hair growth!
customer_reviews.text: this is the 2nd protein brand I tried and I finished the whole bottle after a friend recommended it to me for its delicious taste, not only did I notice a more toned appearance but my hair grew a whole inch in two months which was unexpected. Overall I love this product it is amazing and it absolutely works!!
customer_reviews.author: Regine

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste, stick to the regular Syntha-6 if you dislike the taste of whey
customer_reviews.text: The standard vanilla milkshake-flavored Syntha-6 is by far the best tasting protein powder I’ve ever tried. This, however, is absolutely awful. It is more protein-dense and seems like a lower calorie option but has a strong whey flavor which I cannot stand. Texture is typical and overall is a good choice for the price if you can stomach it.
customer_reviews.author: WDW

customer_reviews.title: Sustains flavor and texture of straw err shake...great job!
customer_reviews.text: Had been using standard Syntha 6 version in strawberry for six months and loved flavor creaminess of a milkshake and the protein load. But the carb was definitely high for a guy wanting to lose 10-15 lbs at the gym ....and now a low carb version is available, thanks...flavor and texture of strawberry flavor has been preserved...so I'll keep on with this !
customer_reviews.author: Dr K.

customer_reviews.title: Top-notch whey protein blend that doesn't skimp on the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Although a bit pricey, this stuff dissolves well and has a great taste (both chocolate milkshake and vanilla flavors). I haven't tired of either flavor after using a few canisters of each. If you have trouble finding the scoop, it's probably buried beneath the powder. Just use a fork to probe around and dredge it up. Also love the fact that this is a blend of whey protein concentrate, isolate and hydroslate, so you get benefits of all 3 types. Additionally it contains micellar casein. BSN knows what they are doing!
customer_reviews.author: Lamar Ladner

customer_reviews.title: Overbearing Artificial Sweetener (Imo)
customer_reviews.text: Artificial sweetener taste is just too strong for me. The actual chocolate flavouring is good but the Sucralose / Splenda taste is quite overbearing for me. Frankly I'd rather have more calories and real sugar, or no sugar and you can add your own sweetener. If artificial sweetener doesn't bother you, this is probably a great protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Jake S

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good enough to drink as a milkshake even if it wasn't a protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This is incredibly good tasting compared to other vanilla protein powders I've tried. It's slightly less calorie-efficient for the amount of protein in each scoop, but I think it's worth it for the incredible taste. This tastes good enough that I would drink it as a milkshake even if it wasn't a protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McConnell

customer_reviews.title: ALL flavors taste great, awesome mixability & milkshake creaminess.
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall 3 fat 1 SatFat 6 carbs 3 sugar 24 protein fantastic macro ratio, I'm satisfied. Tried their chocolate peanut butter, with a frozen banana (a favorite) Also the vanilla is good, I add a frozen banana & PbFit peanut butter powder 32g scoop 16g protein 6g fat (extra protein minus the fat) delicious. Also have the strawberry it's fantastic with just crushed ice & water (or milk) or actual frozen strawberries.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting protein.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it was pure casein (it’s not). But I used it anyway in place of my regular whey. The taste is way better than any protein I’ve ever had. It tastes like chocolate milk, without being too sweet from artificial sweeteners. And the price is much lower on amazon than in stores. It mixes easily without clumps and goes just fine with water or almond milk. Would have left 5 stars if not for the confusion about protein type. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay W

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a HUGE container of protein powder and such a great price on Prime Day. The chocolate flavor tastes great, mixes well and didn’t cause any bloating or stomach upset like some protein shakes have caused me in the past. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Whats not to love!
customer_reviews.text: Syntha6 is by far the best protein I think I have ever had and they made it better by making a "lean" version. I love this flavor, it tastes like a milk shake which is awesome when you are trying to cut out sweets and extra carbs. Do yourself a favor and give this a shot, if you are looking for a protein supplement.
customer_reviews.author: PurchasinStuff

customer_reviews.title: and this is the best tasting and best texture I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of protein powders through the years, and this is the best tasting and best texture I have tried! Has all the important ingredients in it and tastes great! A perfect combination! Blend a banana into the strawberry with milk and you have an awesome shake! If you are searching for a good protein drink, buy this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inedible
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this because it smells strongly of a chemical odor. I don't mean like fake sugar or artificial flavor like someone sensitive may have trouble with. I mean it smells like a linoleum tile factory, and maybe a little like peanut butter. It smells BAD. I'm guessing it was stored improperly, and that the seal came off the top or maybe it's a bad batch but it's inedible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BSN is the way to go every time
customer_reviews.text: Ok for anyone that doesn’t know protein- buy BSN and never look back. I’ve tried s lot of protein over the past decade + and this is the way to go. Everyone has their flavor preference of course, but BSN protein is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Ben A.

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite and reliable protein powders currently
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite and reliable protein powders currently. No funny taste or digestive issues. The Edge version of Syntha-6 is slightly higher protein and fewer calories for a serving, so that makes it my go-to for a reasonably priced powder.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory B

customer_reviews.title: Cookies and Cream
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Syntha-6 Edge Cookies & Cream, I did alot of research and reading of reviews, I CANNOT believe how good this tastes. I read some reviews saying it was too sweet, not the case. I read some reviews that said it tasted like a cookies & cream milkshake, I added 5oz of Almond Milk and that's exactly how it tastes. I'm not sure if I'm going to order this again or explore the other flavors they have to offer. I will keep you posted, but Cookies & Cream gets 👍👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate milkshake!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s my third order from here cause it’s convenient for me. Taste is absolutely amazing I use it with water but before with half milk half water gave it even better creamier consistency. I’m not fond of big plastic jar I’d rather have it in a bag. But non of the less my favorite product among all others.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Blondyx

customer_reviews.title: Not as creamy as expected
customer_reviews.text: I tried the original syntha-6 before trying syntha-6 edge thinking edge is newer and probably better. I looked at the specs and seemed like an upgrade. To me, I didn't notice any significant differences in results, however the thing that bugged me the most with edge was that it didn't dissolve very well. After vigorous mixing it still remained clumpy and powdery. Original syntha-6 had a much creamier consistency. But I bought the giant bottle so had to finish it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to post work out now.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several different protein powders and flavors from different brands but the sugar cookie is my favorite of all time. Tastes exactly like that. Best with whole milk. Make this a year long thing Syntha-6! Don’t McRib me bro...
customer_reviews.author: Benjman

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I searched and searched for a way to say a little money on my supplements and for a shake that included Casein to help with between meal cravings. I was buying whey and casein separate for the longest time and finally a friend told me about this and it is awesome and saves me a good chunk of money.
customer_reviews.author: Wendan

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great, Less Filling
customer_reviews.text: The Syntha-6 brand in general just tastes better than the rest. Not chalky or with any sort of weird aftertaste, it's just pleasant. Hard to say if it works, but I have put on 25 lbs since starting to work out 6-7 months ago. Is it the 6 day/week workout plan, this product, or both? Impossible to say, but I'll keep using this
customer_reviews.author: Unimproved Ends

customer_reviews.title: Quantity.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product today. Literally almost half of the container is in fact AIR. Not happy about that. Feels like from the $40.00 you charge, $30 is for the actual protein powder and the other $10 is an vaccines air sealed fee. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos L.

customer_reviews.title: No weird after taste!
customer_reviews.text: I am super picky about protein powder, most stuff either has a weird after taste or it just doesn’t mix well but this stuff is great! It mixes well and has a good taste. It has no weird after taste either. It is super sweet though, so I mix 1 scoop with 8 oz of cold unsweetened coffee and put some ice cubes in it and I have an iced coffee! Tastes just as good as Starbucks if not better!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Tastes just like a strawberry milkshake! YUM!
customer_reviews.text: For years I'd been hearing how good and flavorful this protein shake was. How it tastes just like a milkshake, etc. So I finally ordered myself a container and it really does live up to the hype. In fact at first I thought perhaps it was slightly too sweet but I've adjusted since then. Its so satisfying! You don't have to sacrifice taste for nutrition!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy anything else, I love it
customer_reviews.text: I literally hate all but one protein shakes, and this is the lucky one I absolutely love! It doesn't have that protein taste like chalk. It is absolutely delicious. I will forever order this.
customer_reviews.author: Lnt7

customer_reviews.title: SoOoOO Bombbbbb!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying this container is HUGE! I Havnt been on the protein shake hunt for very long but the few I have tried out were not the best tasting, pricey, and kind of chalky. But THIS ONE HERE Is one I can stick to. Taste great just like a smooth strawberry milkshake
customer_reviews.author: Snookumz

customer_reviews.title: BSN, CHEAP TASTY AND HEALTHY, READ ALL ABOUT IT!
customer_reviews.text: Tbh all there stuff tastes good. If your a newbie and hate most protein shakes because they taste like chalk or dirt. Try anything syntha 6. Btw vanilla or gram cracker. Put one scoopie with some milk and frozen tart cherries. YUMMMO👌👌👌👌
customer_reviews.author: 👍

customer_reviews.title: Flavors are hit and miss
customer_reviews.text: The Syntha-6 Edge vanilla milkshake flavor is fantastic. It is my favorite protein powder of any brand. However, the other flavors that I have tried are a total letdown. The cookies and cream tastes like stale birthday cake. The chocolate milkshake is awful. It tastes like stale, sweet nothing. It has no chocolate flavor at all. I don’t dare stray from the vanilla milkshake again.
customer_reviews.author: BWT

customer_reviews.title: Please fill bottle to the top!
customer_reviews.text: This product should have been a 5 start review. I have used ban products for a while now from the protein to the preworkout. I recommend this company to anyone who asks what supplements I’ve been taking. But I received this syntha 6 protein powder. I opened the box and instantly I saw it was 3/4th full. I’m not sure if all the tubs or syntha 6 are like this or if it was just mine. For 40.00 I feel like I only received 30.00 of product witch kinda sucked. But overall flavor is great and mixibility is 5 starts as well. I’m not usually one to complain but this was a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: zachary

customer_reviews.title: Finally found my go to protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delicious!! My husband is the one who uses protein powder more than I do but that’s because the others we have tried have had poor quality. Our last protein powder was the GNC brand and it was too gritty and the flavor was just meh for me. But when this arrived, I made a point of trying at least one serving and I absolutely love it!! The flavor is phenomenal!! It is not gritty or chalky and it blends really well with hardly any lumps. I think I have found a protein powder we both can finally enjoy!! And the price can’t be beat for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well, great taste
customer_reviews.text: Mixes really well with almond milk (all I tried it with). Great taste, really does taste like a milkshake. Kinda thick if you use their measurements I use 8-10 oz of almond milk and it’s perfect for me to drink quickly after a workout. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cfranchyze

customer_reviews.title: Consistently Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for years now. I mix it in my morning fruit smoothie (blended with a Nutribullet). I am most impressed by the consistency of the product, shipment after shipment. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cayambe

customer_reviews.title: A bit too sweet
customer_reviews.text: It does taste a lot like a sugar cookie but it's also a bit sweeter than an actual sugar cookie. This was okay but I prefer a lot of other flavors more.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Ronin

customer_reviews.title: Totally Amazing Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Another AMAZING Syntha flavor! I think this is solidly now my go-to protein powder brand! Cannot beat the taste and the nutritional values are right where they need to be. Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Nash

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, low carbs and good protein
customer_reviews.text: Love BSN products. if you’re looking for a high quality isolate protein supplement with low calories this is a great product to buy. I’ve bought both cookies&Cream and chocolate and both taste really good.
customer_reviews.author: Bilal Alhawasli

customer_reviews.title: Gawd Awful Taste
customer_reviews.text: Who could ever think this tastes good? I made a HUGE mistake in purchasing this and will NEVER buy BSN protein again. It's hard to describe, but the aftertaste and general flavor is so "chemical" like that it's hard to gag down. Bummed, because after two attempts (and two whole scoops) it's going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S Filonowich

customer_reviews.title: Good Flavor
customer_reviews.text: When blended together with powdered peanutbutter, its one of the better tasting protein shakes in my recipe book. Im planning to try it blended with cream cheese for a cheesecake flavored shake next.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas rieker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pre bed, or meal replacement shake
customer_reviews.text: Its a great blend of proteins, giving it a longer effective time frame in the digestive track. I mix this with one scoop of isopure zero carb and 70grams of strawberries and 30 grams of bananas with a cup of unsweetened vanilla almond milk, and 4 ice cubes and its the most delicious, thick, strawberry shake ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jody R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Third one of these I have gotten. Really do taste great. Was amazed how good the strawberry was, but they all taste great. As for the other things, I'm not a body builder. Just trying to increase protein intake to retain muscle mass. I can definitely say I like the taste. I mix the chocolate with my coffee in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Dosier

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Protein
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting protein! I searched around for about a year going from protein to protein trying to find one that tasted great and ended great. If you are a protein drinker you know that not all proteins end well. Some can be very harsh on the system but with syntha-6 it has not been the case. I recommend this one to everyone. I can't brag enough about the taste and quality!
customer_reviews.author: TekkFit

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the taste of this product. I use it with chocolate protein milk and it tastes great. Blend with ice and it's like a shake.
customer_reviews.author: GingerATL

customer_reviews.title: Great protein!
customer_reviews.text: A friend introduced me to it in 2018. Bought it once and used it all up. The flavor is good and it isn’t too thick or watery. I’m barely getting back into lifting again due to a horrendous back injury I suffered at the end of 2018. It’s 48 serving per container and it’s basically a meal replacer haha. Remember the human body can only absorb so much protein at a time. My two cents.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product love having syntha 6 the flavor is great and I am getting the protein I need highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Terrell

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Several years ago, Sonic had a campfire s’mores blast as a limited edition summer flavor, and the Graham Cracker syntha-6 protein tastes IDENTICAL to that shake!! SO excited to add this into my rotation. You just can’t beat syntha-6 for their perfectly smooth texture and accurate flavors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is super deceptive
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, however the tub is only half full. Deceptive packaging. Back of the package says “contents sold by weight, not volume, as to say “not our fault you fell for our clever product photo of the giant tub and didn’t read the fine print”. They could at least make the tub not see through. It’s like a slap in the face the second you receive it. Whatever. 4lbs of good protein is 4lbs of good protein. 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mick bond

customer_reviews.title: Great Protien at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Used this when I was in Iraq & Afghanistan for my meal replacements/add-on as I needed a ton of calories then. I am back to using it as a meal supplement and post-workout. Great stuff, even better than before with the new formula/recipe! Keep it up guys! Great value here
customer_reviews.author: Offutt0311

customer_reviews.title: Great mix!
customer_reviews.text: Still my favorite protein mix I've tried yet. They have excellent flavor, decent mixing (for a protein mix), and results are amazing recovery times. Now if only my joints could keep up with my muscles...
customer_reviews.author: TheRandomTinker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protein shake!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent protein shake. I have been using Syntha6 for a couple of years now and this has helped me through my workouts. The taste is great and there are no chunks of powder!
customer_reviews.author: Cap Singh

customer_reviews.title: Problem Solved!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite creamer is the seasonal Sugar Cookie that comes out around thanksgiving and goes away around Christmas. I'm always bummed out once my supply runs out. Problem solved! I mix this in with some iced coffee and get the best of both worlds! I've always preferred Syntha 6 to other protein powders so I was happy to see Sugar Cookie as an option. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tates Great!
customer_reviews.text: This definitely tastes better than the ON powder I was using previously. I'm not sure it is the change in supplements , or the change in workout routine (probably both), but I have seen some gains! I definitely like this supplement. The jug is definitely way too big for the amount of powder it comes with, so they could cut the waste. Great powder tho.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L.

customer_reviews.title: Like drinking brownies
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite protein powder to date. Previously I was using the regular Syntha 6 but switched to the edge for the lower carb count. It tastes almost identical and has the same milk-shake thickness.
customer_reviews.author: CMCROW

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Have been buying it for over 7 years.. works well but seriously tastes very good..
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: Cookies and cream flavor is a vibe. Ice + almond milk + a scoop of this tastes like I'm just eating a milkshake. Ingredients/nutrition list is up to par with every brand out there. Love the fact it has whey and casein. Will be buying again and trying other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: New favorite protein powder! It doesn't leave that typical protein powder taste behind and is seriously so good. I like to add a couple oreos and blend it together with a cup of whole milk and it is tasty. I don't experience any bloating with it either. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting protein powder!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I always struggle to find a protein powder with good ingredients AND a decent taste.. however, this powder exceeded my expectations! It taste like you are cheating on your diet.. the taste is amazing! (highly recommend if you are craving a milkshake that you mix this in a shaker & freeze for a bit) YUMMY!
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Ila

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: I love banana, strawberry, chocolate, and vanilla. I switch off between those flavors becIs of price and taste. This stuff is good even I’m water. I drink mine with coconut milk.
customer_reviews.author: FittyP.

customer_reviews.title: The chocolate milkshake is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Best protein I have ever taken! Just mix with water and literally tastes like a milkshake. It's really tasty and does not have a gross after taste. The macros in this protein are also perfect if you are trying to lose or maintain weight.
customer_reviews.author: Lili and Elson

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting protein
customer_reviews.text: This protein tastes great and doesn't have that gritty texture you sometimes get with powders. I mix mine with milk to get a creamier shake. Definitely buying again.
customer_reviews.author: TayLeather

customer_reviews.title: Cinnamon bun flavor does not taste good
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend this flavor. Go for the strawberry or some other option, but not this cinnamon bun.
customer_reviews.author: CRich

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years but the updated one has more protein. Mixes easily and good taste. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: PETER ALLOTTA

customer_reviews.title: Protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This is a good protein powder.... I have used it off an on throughout the past few years and it is still the best one out there
customer_reviews.author: Mondo M

customer_reviews.title: BSN is the Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using BSN products for 5mo now and WOW what remarkable products. I've not only noticed gains and significantly noticable weight loss. I'll never use another product. Great quality. Minimal fillers. Taste is far superior. Total package in all your fitness support needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Choose the flavor carefully
customer_reviews.text: Synth is 6 is my go to, heard peanut butter cookie was the best. Definitely not. Can’t take a drink without gagging. Bought strawberry and it’s infinitely better.
customer_reviews.author: Yeet

customer_reviews.title: Great way to start the day!
customer_reviews.text: We Mix this with Coffee and some coconut oil for a breakfast replacement shake. It is YUUUMMMYYY! I highly recommend this stuff. Keeps my appetite down for hours and tastes delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Good, just a tastes quite artificial.
customer_reviews.text: Taste isn't bad, just that it tastes like something that came out of a lab, not the grocery store. But then it did so..... Otherwise great value.
customer_reviews.author: superduper

customer_reviews.title: Taste pretty good, texture comes out well when mixed with ...
customer_reviews.text: Taste pretty good, texture comes out well when mixed with water. Mixes extremely well with water, but clumps up a lot with milk, which was disappointing. However, you can just add an extra scoop instead of milk, which I've found to be adequate.
customer_reviews.author: WG

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmmmmm
customer_reviews.text: Loved the taste and the fact that it dissolves completely fairly fast, just wish they put more in that giant jug (that comes half full)but other then that I'm hooked
customer_reviews.author: Vinny Gower

customer_reviews.title: Love SYNTHA6!
customer_reviews.text: Syntha 6 has the best taste of any protein I’ve had. Strawberry milkshake is amazing. Especially with almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: Elaica Zayas

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor and consistency ever
customer_reviews.text: The best tasting protein powder I've ever had. Consistency is thick and creamy as advertised and no fake sweetness.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: FLABBERGASTED
customer_reviews.text: Thanks so much... Best Protein mix ever... Extremely FLABBERGASTED about the taste & my recovery. 52yr old Retired Marine, since taking it after just a week I'm already getting results. OhRah
customer_reviews.author: Francis Babeu

customer_reviews.title: Win on the taste
customer_reviews.text: Goes down smooth, no after taste..still waiting to see results.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like your cheating...
customer_reviews.text: All the Syntha-6 Edge flavors are delicious. The shakes are smooth and do not have the grit other protein powders do. Try all the flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Adria

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I'm no nutritionist so I won't pretend to say this is the best powder chemically but plenty of others have attested to that so I believe them. What I can say is that this stuff is delicious- by far the best tasting protein powder I've come across.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: ... been using consistently for a few months and saw excellent gains in strength and size (in the right places)
customer_reviews.text: I've been using consistently for a few months and saw excellent gains in strength and size (in the right places). 25%+ gains in strength within 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff it mixes very well. It says not to use whole milk but it seemed fine with it, I've also used 2% and it was fine with that as well. It does have a strange aftertaste but overall I think it's great would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Haraburda

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I got the chocolate flavor, and it is delicious! I usually just mix it with water, and the flavor is perfect. I love that it has quite a bit more protein per serving compared to other protein powders out there. I struggle to meet my daily protein requirements, and this has helped tremendously. I plan on trying out some other flavors next.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Light

customer_reviews.title: Great all around protien
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, good macros, found it on sale, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protein powder I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I buy this brand all the time. The taste is very delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Waldemar

customer_reviews.title: ... a protein powder that mixes completely and tastes very good - even when made with ice /water
customer_reviews.text: This is a protein powder that mixes completely and tastes very good - even when made with ice /water. Made with milk it tastes even better! It's not like others that need fruit or yogurt added to be palatable! That's huge if you're using this as a meal replacement for weight loss - fruit, milk and yogurt all add calories, which will hinder weight loss!
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it initially but I think with some experimentation it could be decent. It's like a severely watered down peanut butter cookie.
customer_reviews.author: John m.f. Doe

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Packaging issues.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product, in terms of protien powder. It tastes great compared to some other brands. Although, when I received the item the seal was not on the container, but rather stuck on the lid, and the container had powder all over it. Unsure on how this happens.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron King

customer_reviews.title: Amazing protein
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good protein to take! The taste really good and mixes no problem. Definitely would recommend this problem for anyone working out or anyone needing protein intake.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This shake tastes amazing-- it barely tastes like a protein shake!
customer_reviews.author: Dimetan1

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is so delicious. I have a hard time with chalky consistency and this doesnt have that at all. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve enjoyed almost all products I’ve tried from bsn. Vanilla, peanut butter cookie, strawberry have all been delicious!
customer_reviews.author: EMP

customer_reviews.title: Good but sweet
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good. Very sweet, especially compared to other brands. Blended well.
customer_reviews.author: public name

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: It takes delicious. I've noticed results with muscle growth, as well
customer_reviews.author: King D Mane

customer_reviews.title: Same great taste
customer_reviews.text: All the great taste of the regular Syntha 6, with added benefits. This really is the best tasting protein powder I've had. I love this stuff in a smoothie with some fruit, almond milk, and some ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F. Sova

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting powder in my opinion. Literally taste like cold “hot chocolate” when mixed with milk!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: After being an original Syntha-6 user for years, I was skeptical on how this would taste with lower carbs and fat. I was surprised it's just as delicious and smooth as the original. I love the chocolate milkshake, strawberry milkshake and cookies and cream flavors and will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Protein Powder. Good for Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting protein out there. I’ve tried a TON of protein powders. Definitely my favorite. Mixes really well with fruit smoothies and tastes good stand alone.
customer_reviews.author: Dave93

customer_reviews.title: Ok tastes
customer_reviews.text: It tastes alright, not bad but also not as good as others
customer_reviews.author: Bi

customer_reviews.title: delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vanilla flavor, often will add coffee to it for extra deliciousness. It dissolves fairly quickly in water using a spoon in a touch of room temp water, then I add cashew, almond milk or just water. Is a creamy mouthfeel.
customer_reviews.author: RBG

customer_reviews.title: Terrible protein!
customer_reviews.text: It caused me to breakout and it didn’t do anything for my gains. Horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

product_meta.title: BSN SYNTHA-6 Edge Protein Powder, with Hydrolyzed Whey, Micellar Casein, Milk Protein Isolate, Low Sugar, 24g Protein, Chocolate Milkshake, 28 Servings
product_meta.description: Flavor:Chocolate Milkshake| Size:28 ServingsSYNTHA-6 EDGE is a synthesis of premium proteins, designed to give your muscles the protein they need to support recovery without the excess carbs and fat you may not want. This lean, protein packed shake delivers a milkshake-like experience that will have you convinced it’s your cheat day. Give your recovery the performance edge. Fuel your muscles and reward your taste buds with SYNTHA-6 EDGE.
feature_bullets: GIVE YOURSELF AN EDGE –give your recovery the performance edge to help you achieve your health and fitness goals
CREAMY & RICH TEXTURE – the texture of a real milkshake without the excess carbs and fat you would associate with a powder this delicious

24G PROTEIN-MATRIX – consisting of whey protein concentrate, whey protein isolate, hydrolyzed whey protein, calcium caseinate, micellar casein, milk protein concentrate to give your muscles the protein they need to support recovery
11G NATURALLY OCCURRING BCAAs and EAAs – helps support muscle recovery following intense bouts of exercise
USE ANY TIME OF DAY – post-workout, between meals, as a snack, or as a treat, it doesn’t matter – BSN Syntha-6 Edge was formulated to be your any time of day protein powder

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
